name: Garry Royale!
description:
Garry was living a happy life after defeating Evil Lord Bad, until his world was invaded by duplicates of both him and his firends/eneimes! Drop into this brand new, totally original idea tjhat has not been overdone with feratures like:

  • Guns
  • Epic 3d character models of the Garry crew!
  • Free 2 pay

Conytrols:

Crtl: Turn left

Alt: turn right

delete: shoot

crtl + alt: move
